confirm-decline: Do you really want to decline this booking request?
decline-error: Message can't be blank or more than 200 characters!
error-message-header: Request could not be declined because of following error(s):
page-desc: You are about to decline a booking request from <1>{{nickname}}</1> for the dates of <3>{{startDate}}</3> until <5>{{endDate}}</5>
